name: Blocks and Build: Crafting
description:
Free sandbox with unlimited generation of the game world, discover amazing biomes, from the snow-covered forests of the rocky mountains. A beautiful and magical world of the cubes, the craft and the search for resources, dark caves and dangerous mines, many blocks to create stunning buildings, various interior and decorations!
Completely free game for kids and adults, for boys and girls, explore the world, mining treasures and make new friends. A huge variety of characters waiting for you and your adventures!
